    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        protected String getStatus​(Status status)
        Returns the current status of the requested status element. See Status for a list of possible items returned by getStatus. If the status isn't part of the response "" is returned.
        Parameters:
        status - the status desired
        Returns:
        the desired status information

      • isSingle

        public boolean isSingle()
        Description copied from interface: ServerStatus
        Returns if the player plays a single track. If true, activated, playback is stopped after current song, or song is repeated if the 'repeat' mode is enabled.
        Specified by:
        isSingle in interface ServerStatus
        Returns:
        true if the player plays a single track;

      • getMixRampDb

        public Optional<Integer> getMixRampDb()
        Description copied from interface: ServerStatus
        The threshold at which songs will be overlapped. Like crossfading but doesn’t fade the track volume, just overlaps.
        Specified by:
        getMixRampDb in interface ServerStatus
        Returns:
        the threshold at which songs will be overlapped. Like crossfading but doesn’t fade the track volume, just overlaps.

        Returns:

      • setExpiryInterval

        public void setExpiryInterval​(long seconds)
        Description copied from interface: ServerStatus
        Sets the length of time that the status is considered expired. Set to 0 to always call the server
        Specified by:
        setExpiryInterval in interface ServerStatus
        Parameters:
        seconds - the number of seconds before the loaded status is considered expired
